00014 class CMFileVCF extends CMError implements CMFile, CMFileMultiReader, CMFileMultiWriter {
00015  
00021  public static function Version() {
00022   return "1.0";

00031   return "1.0";

00037  public function CMFileVCF() {
00038  }

00043  private $f = false;
00044  
00051  public function readString($content, $a = false) {
00052   // prepare
00053   $r = array();
00054   $entry = array();
00055   
00056   // split lines
00057   $lines = explode("\n", $content);
00058   
00059   // process the lines
00060   foreach($lines as $line) {
00061    // this is important, because ':' is special it has to be recognised
00062    $line = trim($line);
00063    if(strlen($line) == 0) continue;
00064    $line = str_replace('\:', '@@@', $line);
00065    
00066    if($line == 'BEGIN:VCARD') {
00067     $entity = array();
00068    } else if($line == 'END:VCARD') {
00069     $r[] = $entity;
00070    } else {
00071     $parts = explode(':', $line);
00072     $k = explode(';', $parts[0]);
00073     $entity[strtoupper($k[0])][]['value'] = str_replace('@@@', ':', $parts[1]);
00074     for($i = 1; $i < count($k); ++$i) {
00075      $attr = explode('=', $k[$i]);
00076      $entity[strtoupper($k[0])][count($entity[$k[0]]) - 1]['attr'][][$attr[0]] = $attr[1];
00077     }
00078    }
00079   }
00080   
00081   return $r;
00082  }
00083  
00090  public function readFile($url, $a = false) {
00091   // all we have to do with this function is setup the input file handle
00092   $this->f = fopen($url, "r");
00093   if(!$this->f) {
00094    $this->throwError("File could not be opened", array('uri' => $url));
00095    return false;
00096   }
00097    
00098   // $a must be an array
00099   if(!is_array($a))
00100    $a = array($a => true);
00101   
00102   // skip lines
00103   if(isset($a['skip'])) {
00104    for($i = 0; $i < $a['skip']; ++$i)
00105     $this->readNext();
00106   }
00107   
00108   return true;
00109  }
00110

00172  public function readNext($options = false) {
00173   // prechecks
00174   $r = false;
00175   $vcard = false;
00176   if($this->f === false || feof($this->f))
00177    return $r;
00178   
00179   // reading the file one line at a time look for the open
00180   while(!feof($this->f)) {
00181    $line = trim(fgets($this->f));
00182    if($line == "")
00183     continue;
00184    
00185    $pos = strpos($line, ":");
00186    if($pos !== false) {
00187     $key = substr($line, 0, $pos);
00188     $value = substr($line, $pos + 1);
00189    }
00190    
00191    if($line == "BEGIN:VCARD")
00192     $r = new CMVCard();
00193    elseif($line == "END:VCARD")
00194     return $r;
00195     
00196    elseif($key == "VERSION")
00197     $r->setVersion($value);
00198     
00199    else {
00200     $k = explode(';', $key);
00201     $attributes = array();
00202     for($i = 1; $i < count($k); ++$i) {
00203      $attr = explode('=', $k[$i]);
00204      $attributes[$attr[0]] = $attr[1];
00205     }
00206     $r->add($k[0], $value, $attributes);
00207    }
00208   }
00209   
00210   return false;
00211  }
00212  
00220  public function isBinary() {
00221   return false;

00227  public function __toString() {
00228   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00229  }

00249  public function prepareWriteFile($uri, $a = false) {
00250   // $a must be an array
00251   if(!is_array($a))
00252    $a = array($a => true);
00253   
00254   // this method only has to open the writing file handle
00255   if(isset($a['append']))
00256    $this->f = fopen($uri, "a+");
00257   else $this->f = fopen($uri, "w");
00258   
00259   if($this->f === false)
00260    return $this->throwWarning("The output file could not be opened",
00261       array('uri' => $uri));
00262   
00263   return $this->f !== false;
00264  }
00265  
00277  public function finishWriteFile($a = array()) {
00278   if($this->f !== false)
00279    fclose($this->f);
00280   return true;
00281  }
00282  
00287  function writeNext($item = false) {
00288   if($this->f === false)
00289    return false;
00290    
00291   // item must be a CMVCard
00292   if(get_class($item) != "CMVCard")
00293    return $this->throwWarning("\$item must be a CMVCard object.");
00294    
00295   fwrite($this->f, "BEGIN:VCARD\n");
00296   fwrite($this->f, "VERSION:" . $item->getVersion() . "\n");
00297   foreach($item->getData() as $k => $value) {
00298    foreach($value as $v) {
00299     fwrite($this->f, strtoupper(trim(str_replace(':', '\:', $k))));
00300     if(is_array($v['attr'])) {
00301      foreach($v['attr'] as $ak => $av) {
00302       fwrite($this->f, ';');
00303       if($av != "")
00304        fwrite($this->f, "$ak=$av");
00305       else
00306        fwrite($this->f, $ak);
00307      }
00308     }
00309     fwrite($this->f, ":" . str_replace(':', '\:', $v['value']) . "\n");
00310    }
00311   }
00312   fwrite($this->f, "END:VCARD\n");
00313   
00314   return true;
00315  }
00316  
00317 }
